POTENCIACIÓN DE NÚMEROS ENTEROS - Ejercicios 1, 2 y 3

(1) [imath] \frac{5^{13} \cdot 5^{17}}{5^{11} \cdot 5^{16} \cdot 5} \quad [/imath] PROFE\n2) [imath] \frac{(-4)^{6} \cdot(-4)^{5} \cdot(-4)^{20} \cdot(-4)^{3}}{(-4)^{8} \cdot(-4)^{19} \cdot(-4)^{4}} [/imath]\n3) [imath] \left[\frac{\left(2^{3} \cdot 2^{6}\right)^{-2} \cdot\left(3^{4}\right)^{3} \cdot 3}{\left(2^{6} \cdot 2^{10}\right)^{-1} \cdot\left(3^{6} \cdot 3^{2} \cdot 3^{5}\right)}\right]^{10} [/imath]
